name: the stony shore cardigan
notes:
description:
the stony shore cardigan will be your new favorite sweater! itâ€™s beginner friendly and a breeze to make. it features a beautiful stitch repeat for amazing texture and balloon style sleeves! the sleek pockets are the perfect touch on your new cardigan.

[this pattern is free on my blog][1].

[this pattern is a kit on lion brand!][2] the kit comes with the digital pdf pattern + all the yarn you need to make your own. you can even customize your color choice!

[this pattern has a full video tutorial on my youtube channel!][3]
